original_solution_mapping.L1: First find how many pieces are total in each puzzle. 8 puzzles * 300 pieces each = <<8*300=2400>>2400 pieces.
original_solution_mapping.L3: All of the puzzles have 2400 pieces + 2500 pieces = <<2400+2500=4900>>4900 pieces total.
original_solution_mapping.L4: He will work a maximum of 7 hours each day * 100 pieces per hour = <<7*100=700>>700 pieces per day.
original_solution_mapping.L5: So he will end up taking 4900 pieces total / 700 pieces per day = <<4900/700=7>>7 days total.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7155.
    Returns: the total number of days to complete all puzzles.
    """
    # L1
    num_puzzles_type1 = 8 # eight puzzles
    pieces_per_puzzle_type1 = 300 # 300 pieces each
    total_pieces_type1 = num_puzzles_type1 * pieces_per_puzzle_type1

    # L2
    num_puzzles_type2 = 5 # five puzzles
    pieces_per_puzzle_type2 = 500 # 500 pieces each
    total_pieces_type2 = num_puzzles_type2 * pieces_per_puzzle_type2

    # L3
    total_all_pieces = total_pieces_type1 + total_pieces_type2

    # L4
    max_hours_per_day = 7 # maximum of 7 hours each day
    pieces_per_hour = 100 # 100 pieces per hour
    pieces_per_day = max_hours_per_day * pieces_per_hour

    # L5
    total_days = total_all_pieces / pieces_per_day

    # FA
    answer = total_days
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: First find how many pieces are total in each puzzle. {num_puzzles_type1} puzzles * {pieces_per_puzzle_type1} pieces each = <<{num_puzzles_type1}*{pieces_per_puzzle_type1}={total_pieces_type1}>>{total_pieces_type1} pieces.
All of the puzzles have {total_pieces_type1} pieces + {total_pieces_type2} pieces = <<{total_pieces_type1}+{total_pieces_type2}={total_all_pieces}>>{total_all_pieces} pieces total.
He will work a maximum of {max_hours_per_day} hours each day * {pieces_per_hour} pieces per hour = <<{max_hours_per_day}*{pieces_per_hour}={pieces_per_day}>>{pieces_per_day} pieces per day.
So he will end up taking {total_all_pieces} pieces total / {pieces_per_day} pieces per day = <<{total_all_pieces}/{pieces_per_day}={total_days}>>{total_days} days total.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_puzzles_type2' (5) was used instead of 'pieces_per_hour' (100).
